data.eml:eml: To the revision of the genus Thionia Stål (Hemiptera, Fulgoroidea, Issidae), with description of new genera and new subtribe

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gnezdilov, Dimir M. (2018): To the revision of the genus Thionia Stål (Hemiptera, Fulgoroidea, Issidae), with description of new genera and new subtribe. Zootaxa 4434 (1): 158-170, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4434.1.10
